name: Recommend
description: Allows you to have a recommendation slider when a user scrolls to the end of a page, heavily inspired from the New York Times.

customDescription.label: Custom Description
customDescription.info: You can enter this either as plain text or you can also use HTML if you would like to include links.

doNotShowOnPages.label: Do not show on pages
doNotShowOnPages.info: If checked this will not display the recommendations for page templates.

doNotShowOnEssays.label: Do not show on essays
doNotShowOnEssays.info: If checked this will not display the recommendations for essay templates.

offset.label: Page Offset
offset.info: This determines how many pixels from the bottom of the page the user must scroll within before the recommendation slides in. The default is set to 100px from the bottom.

visibility.label: Visibility
visibility.info: This setting determines how the visibility for the plugin will work. Auto will show the slider once the page has been scrolled into view, otherwise it will show it automatically. Scroll will show only if a scroll event has been triggered. And always will show the slide automatically on page load.
